revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Weather !! Description !! Type modifier(s) !! RNG weight !! Region |- | [[File:Clear.png|30px]] Clear || The weather is clear and pleasant. || None || 30 || rowspan = 5 | All |- | [[File:Overcast.png|30px]] Overcast || Clouds fill the skies. || Normal x1.1 || 15 |- | [[File:Rain.png|30px]] Rain || It's rainy and humid. || Water x1.1 Bug x1.05 || 10 |- | [[File:Thunderstorm.png|30px]] Thunderstorm || It's currently raining heavily with thunder. || Water x1.1, Electric x1.1 Fire x0.9 || 5 |- | [[File:Sunny.png|30px]] Sunny || The sunlight is strong. || Fire x1.2, Grass x1.1, Water x0.9 || 10 |- | [[File:Snow.png|30px]] Snow || It's cold and snowing. || Ice x1.05 || 5 || rowspan = 3 | Johto onwards |- | [[File:Hail.png|30px]] Hail || It's cold and hailing. || Ice x1.1 || 3 |- | [[File:Blizzard.png|30px]] Blizzard || A howling blizzard blows. || Ice x1.2, Fire x0.9, Grass x0.9 || 2 |- | [[File:Sandstorm.png|30px]] Sandstorm || A sandstorm is raging. || Rock x1.1, Ground x1.1, Steel x1.1 || 10 || Hoenn onwards |- | [[File:Fog.png|30px]] Fog || The fog is deep... || Ghost x1.2 Dark x1.1 Electric x0.9 || 10 || Sinnoh onwards |- | [[File:Windy.png|30px]] Windy || Mysterious strong winds blow. || Flying x1.2, Dragon x1.1 || 1 || Unova onwards |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
